dashboard.templates.template module

Common templates used between pages in the app.

dashboard.templates.template.menu_item_link(text, href)[source]
dashboard.templates.template.template(route: str | None = None, title: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, meta: str | None = None, script_tags: list[Component] | None = None, on_load: EventType | None = None) → Callable[[Callable[[], Component]], Component][source]

The template for each page of the app.

Parameters:

  • route – The route to reach the page.

  • title – The title of the page.

  • description – The description of the page.

  • meta – Additional meta to add to the page.

  • on_load – The event handler(s) called when the page load.

  • script_tags – Scripts to attach to the page.

Returns:

The template with the page content.

Module contents

dashboard.templates.template(route: str | None = None, title: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, meta: str | None = None, script_tags: list[Component] | None = None, on_load: EventType | None = None) → Callable[[Callable[[], Component]], Component][source]

The template for each page of the app.

Parameters:

  • route – The route to reach the page.

  • title – The title of the page.

  • description – The description of the page.

  • meta – Additional meta to add to the page.

  • on_load – The event handler(s) called when the page load.

  • script_tags – Scripts to attach to the page.

Returns:

The template with the page content.
